\usepackage{booktabs}

\usepackage{helvet}

\renewcommand{\sfdefault}{phv}

\setlength{\TPVertModule}{10mm}

\usepackage{enumitem}

\LetLtxMacro{\OldIncludegraphics}{\includegraphics}
\renewcommand{\includegraphics}[2][]{\OldIncludegraphics[width=\linewidth, #1]{#2}}
\renewcommand{\caption}{}

\newcommand{\teamprefix}[2]{% team number
\begin{textblock}{3.5}(0,0)
\begin{tabular}{ll}
Team: & \huge\linespread{6} #1
\end{tabular}

\includegraphics[width=\textwidth]{figures/scratch.pdf}

%\rule{14.4cm}{1.5pt}
\end{textblock}
\textcolor{white}{.}\\ %placeholder
\vspace{10cm}
}%

\newcommand{\individualprefixtable}[4]{% name, name shortcode, team, table
\begin{textblock}{3.5}(0,0)
\fontfamily{phv}\selectfont
\begin{tabular}{ll}
Team: & \Large\linespread{6} \textbf{#3} \normalsize{(Table #4)}\\
      & \\
Name: & \Large\linespread{6} \textbf{#1} (#2)
\end{tabular}

\includegraphics[width=\textwidth]{figures/rat-box.pdf}
%Instructions:
%\begin{multicols}{2}
%\begin{itemize}
%\item Fill in your name and name code above.
%\item Select \emph{extactly one} answer alternative.
%\item Select the one that matches \emph{best}.
%\item Only write within the answer box above.
%%\item No helping material is allowed.
%\item The checksum should show how often you have used any answer alternative.
%\end{itemize}
%\end{multicols}
%\rule{14.4cm}{1.5pt}
\end{textblock}
\textcolor{white}{.}\\ %placeholder
\vspace{6cm}
}%

\newcommand{\individualprefix}[3]{% name, name shortcode, team, table
\begin{textblock}{3.5}(0,0)
\fontfamily{phv}\selectfont
\begin{tabular}{ll}
Team: & \Large\linespread{6} \textbf{#3}\\
      & \\
Name: & \Large\linespread{6} \textbf{#1} (#2)
\end{tabular}

\includegraphics[width=\textwidth]{figures/rat-box.pdf}
%Instructions:
%\begin{multicols}{2}
%\begin{itemize}
%\item Fill in your name and name code above.
%\item Select \emph{extactly one} answer alternative.
%\item Select the one that matches \emph{best}.
%\item Only write within the answer box above.
%%\item No helping material is allowed.
%\item The checksum should show how often you have used any answer alternative.
%\end{itemize}
%\end{multicols}
%\rule{14.4cm}{1.5pt}
\end{textblock}
\textcolor{white}{.}\\ %placeholder
\vspace{6cm}
}%

% pandoc creates figures that float away, so we override and set position to H.
% Overwrite \begin{figure}[htbp] with \begin{figure}[H]
\usepackage{float}
\let\origfigure=\figure
\let\endorigfigure=\endfigure
\renewenvironment{figure}[1][]{%
  \origfigure[H]
}{%
  \endorigfigure
}

\begin{document}
\paragraph{Question 1:}
Original question 1

\begin{figure}\centering
\includegraphics{figures/robots.pdf}
\caption{\end{figure}
\begin{enumerate}[label=\textbf{{\Alph*}},labelindent=0pt, labelsep=1.5em, parsep=0.2em]
\item Correct: Originally first, correct answer.
\item Originally second, fake answer.
\item Originally third, fake answer.
\item Originally fourth, fake answer.
\end{enumerate}

Original question 2

\subsubsection*{{Scratchcards for Teams}}
Team 1: 1c 2b 3c 4c 5b 6a 7a 8d 9a 10b\\
Team 2: 1c 2b 3c 4c 5b 6a 7a 8d 9a 10b\\
Team 3: 1c 2b 3c 4c 5b 6a 7a 8d 9a 10b\\
\subsubsection*{Team 1}
Kari Norman:9b 6a 5c 1a 3d 4d 7a 8a 2c 10c\\
Ole Jensen:10c 5b 4c 6c 2b 3b 7b 8b 9c 1d\\
\subsubsection*{Team 2}
Inge Hansen:5d 10d 8b 2c 4d 1b 7b 6d 3c 9c\\
Ida Olsen:6a 8a 1d 5c 10d 9c 2d 4c 3c 7c\\
\subsubsection*{Team 3}
Ina Larsen:10d 7a 1c 4d 3c 6b 2a 5a 9a 8c\\
\cleardoublepage
\newpage

\item Originally third, fake answer.
\end{enumerate}
